doc.field: New York University Collection of Contemporary Composers' Websites
New York University Collection of Contemporary Composers' Websites

Gabriel Kahane is a songwriter, composer, educator, and theater artist from Brooklyn, NY. The website contains a biography of the composer, tour dates, a list of works, videos, and his prose. During the COVID-19 pandemic, he took a digital hiatus and during the last month of the hiatus, sought to write a song every day resulting in the album Magnificent Bird. Words and Music is his newsletter, with posts dating back to 2011. Includes his writings on art, technology, politics, ethics, and his professional activities.

Robots.txt (a piece of code designed to limit crawler activity within a website) was ignored.
Crawl was limited to domains and subdomains of http://gabrielkahane.tumblr.com/ in order to remain within the collection scope and data constraints.
"Music" and "Random" pages were not captured due to technological constraints.
Gabriel Kahane: Words & Music Archived Website: December 2022-ongoing
Gabriel Kahane: Words & Music Archived Website: December 2022-ongoing
